summary:
This is my frist mod XD
A Mod to help increase base HP, MP, STA, CarryWeight.
The price is quite exspensive in order to remain the balance of gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
This is my frist mod XD
A Mod to help increase base HP, MP, STA, CarryWeight.
The price is quite exspensive in order to remain the balance of gameplay.
You can find NPC \"Mystic Thief\" in Riften Thieves Guild Headquarters. 

---Update Potion Pack v 1.2---
- The new type of potion was now able to craft the details, you can buy the Recipe at the NPC Mystic Thief.
- Fixed to price 4 new type of potion.
- Fixed to model of NPC Mystic Thief.

---Potion Pack v1.0---
- Add 4 new type of potion:
+ Potion of Strength Mix (Carrying capacity increases by 5 Points. Can Stack.)
+ Potion of Health Mix (Health is increased by 5 points. Can Stack.) 
+ Potion of Magicka Mix (Magicka is increased by 5 points. Can Stack.) 
+ Potion of Stamina Mix (Stamina is increased by 5 points. Can Stack.)
(Those potions above only rise the duration of effect to 24000 day instead of 300s as usual and can stack, trying to mode to unlimit)
- Those potions can be purchased at NPC \"Mystic Thief\" in Riften Thieves Guild Headquarters.

---Installation---
- Need Game Version: 1.4.27.0.4
- http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14764

(Sorry My English So Bad)
author: Intel
